text: János Áder (born 9 May 1959) is a Hungarian politician. He became the President of Hungary in May 2012.Verseck, Keno. "Close Orban Ally is Hungary's New President." MSN News. 2 May 2012. Accessed 2012-05-05. He left office in May 2022. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Hungary
title: János Áder
